attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Wokingham Borough Council refuses to listen to the views of the residents, who do NOT want the town's last remaining open space to be built on. More than 90 per cent of the people who responded to the council's first consultation were against the development of Elms Field, and the council has received more than 900 letters of complaint.

The council are offering six development options; however there is NO option to retain the park as an open space. 

Councillors are riding roughshod over the views of Wokingham residents and are showing a complete lack of regard for the people they represent.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep Elms Field Green."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15194.asp

Prime Minister's Office
